actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to exempt from social security taxes individuals 65 and over who are eligible for social security benefits and who earn wages below the poverty level.

summary.text: Exempts from social security taxes individuals sixty-five and over who are eligible for social security benefits and who earn wages below the poverty level.

titles.title: A bill to exempt from social security taxes individuals 65 and over who are eligible for social security benefits and who earn wages below the poverty level.
